about_the_game:
Dive into Aquatia, a third-person anime-action RPG game, where you'll become the master of water magic.
You assume the role of Anatia the hero of Valeria Kingdom. You are now on the journey to defeat the witch and restore peace to Valeria's Kingdom.



Experience the graceful aqua ballet,
using water magic to defeat monsters with finesse.



Embrace the role of the water conductor,
wielding water magic's power with elegance.



Explore endless ways to personalize your water magic,
adding your unique touch.



In a world aflame, revolution's in the air,
The guillotine poised, the queen's fate to bear,
But she slips through the night, with vengeance in mind,
Becoming a witch, the kingdom's unkind.

A goddess appears, offering a guiding hand,
A hero, she says, can the kingdom withstand,
Anatia, a young girl, brave and true,
She steps forth to fight, the witch she'll undo.

An epic tale unfolds, for the generations to see,
As Anatia fights for her people, her destiny,
In this world of power, revenge, and the brave,
Anatia's journey, the kingdom she'll save.

Heroes and villains, they dance in the light,
And shades of gray often blur wrong from right,
In the tapestry of stories, where truth may reside,
Anatia's courage, the kingdom's hope and pride.



  • Anime-stylized graphic with cute anime character, making every moment unforgettable.

  • Master the art of aqua Ballet, slash through monsters with elegance. Engage in thrilling hack-and-slash battles with deadly and elegant aqua ballet moves.

  • Explore the mysteries of Aquatia. Uncover the secrets hidden within the vast world of Aquatia, brimming with wonders waiting to be revealed. An epic adventure awaits you at every turn.

  • Customize your skills, define your playstyle with a wide array of water magic abilities to choose from.

  • Control water, unleash creativity and fight strategically. Harness the power of aqua magic to manipulate water in combat or unleash your creativity.

  • Dive deep into a storyline inspired by the French Revolution, with unexpected twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

  • Interact with a colorful cast of NPCs, each harboring their own unique stories waiting for you to uncover and enjoy.

  • Challenge your skills in epic boss fights against formidable foes, from towering rabbits to sinister dark witches.

  • Full Controller Experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
